Then the following rules were followed: |  | sd: If summer>winter AND ratio(greater/lesser)>3 AND Annual total rainfall >350mm = "Summer Dominant" | s: If summer>winter AND ratio(greater/lesser)<3 and >1.3 AND Annual total rainfall >350mm = "Summer" | wd: If winter>summer AND ratio(greater/lesser)>3 AND Annual total rainfall >350mm = "Winter Dominant" | w: If winter>summerAND ratio(greater/lesser)<3 and >1.3 AND Annual total rainfall >350mm = "Winter" | u: If ratio <1.3 AND Annual total rainfall >350mm,"Uniform", | a: If Annual total rainfall < 350mm,"Arid" |  </td> </tr>
